Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management took the following actions.
Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the deductibility of certain payments to officials and employees of foreign governments.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a tax deduction of payments to officials and employees of foreign governments only if such payments would be unlawful under the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977 (currently such payments are not deductible if the payment would violate any of the laws of the United States.).
